translation.en: Oh! Where is that child? Oh, dear. [panting]
Don't play with me today, child.
I'm too old, and my backside is too easy a target.
translation.ko: 늙은 내 등을 맞혀서 뭐 하니

translation.en: Your father has been asking for you.
You'll be the death of me.
Put your two feet next to mine, and we'll see.
Tell me, Nannau. Please. Oh, all right then.
One day, not so long ago...
your mother was sitting in the window,
looking out on the snow that covered the land.
-She was sewing a cap. -A winter cap.
And wishing for a child to grow inside her belly.
Suddenly, she pricked her finger with the needle,
and her blood fell into the snow.
And she looked and thought to herself, "I would like a baby boy."
[chuckling] Go on with you. You know it better than I do.
A little girl with hair as black as the ebony window frame
and skin as pale as the snow and lips as red as blood.
translation.ko: 눈처럼 하얀 피부에 피처럼 빨간 입술을 가진 딸요

translation.en: -[Lilli] Good day. -[woman 3] Always in such a hurry.
What kind of mischief have you been up to today?
I picked roses and irises from the garden with Greta and Ilsa.
translation.ko: 그레타, 일사와 정원의 장미랑 붓꽃을 땄어요

translation.en: Papa, why does God give us wings when we die?
translation.ko: 아빠, 왜 죽으면 신께서 날개를 주시죠?

translation.en: God gives us wings so we can fly out from paradise
translation.ko: 날개를 주시는 건 천국에서 날아올라 세상을 내려다보란 뜻이지

translation.en: and look down upon the world.
Does Mama look down on me?
and she smiles when she hears your prayers.
Do you still love Mama? Always.
What if she doesn't like me?
You are welcome in my house. Thank you, Frederick.
translation.ko: - 내 집에 잘 왔어요 - 고마워요, 프레더릭

translation.en: Lilli, I want you to meet Lady Claudia.
Can I put her in a box?
And what will you do with her when she grows wings?
with a special surprise inside just for you.
translation.ko: 깜짝 선물이 든 상자를 가져왔단다 너 주려고

translation.en: Treat him well, and he will always be faithful.
Look, Nannau. [Nannau] Come along now, Lilliana.
Now, it is yours as well.
God did not bless him with a graceful tongue,
but he more than compensates with the wit of his hands.
Well-- [clears throat] I will leave you to unpack.
[Claudia] What a lovely view. [Nannau] Yes, My Lady.
It was Lady Hoffman's favorite. Was it?
Please be careful. It was my mother's.
Tomorrow, I will be a wife.
What would Mother say if she could see me now?
translation.ko: 어머니가 지금 날 보셨다면 뭐라고 하셨을까?

translation.en: Would she be happy for me?
knowing that the world which so despised her...
[Frederick] I just wanted to be sure that you have everything you need.
translation.ko: 혹시 필요한 건 없나 확인하려고 왔어요

translation.en: Thank you, My Lord, but I am not well provided for at all.
How so? I have everything I need but...
I love to hear the sound of my name on your lips.
translation.ko: 그 입술로 제 이름을 부르시니 참 좋네요

translation.en: -Your hands are cold. -Warm them for me.
I saw you come in here, child. Now show yourself.
translation.ko: 여기 들어오는 거 봤다, 어서 나와

translation.en: [priest] May she rest in peace forever and ever. Amen.
Do you remember my mother, Ilsa? I was young, but I remember her.
translation.ko: - 내 어머니 기억나, 일사? - 어렸을 때지만 기억하죠

translation.en: -Is my face like hers? -Yes. Especially when you smile.
translation.ko: - 내가 어머니를 닮았어? - 네, 특히 미소요

translation.en: My father worshipped her, didn't he?
It's not for me to say, My Lady.
-[barking] -It's Peter! [Ilsa] What? Back so soon from Paris?
Hold on, now. You can't go running off in your shift. You'll catch your death.
translation.ko: 잠깐, 그렇게 나가면 안 되죠 그러다 큰일 나요

translation.en: Don't you ever wonder what's out there, Ilsa, beyond the fields and walls?
translation.ko: 들판과 담 너머엔 뭐가 있나 궁금한 적 없어?

translation.en: The beasts of the forest, I imagine.
There must be more to the world than a forest.
Why would you want to leave your good home?
Because it's not the same home anymore. It hasn't been for a long time.
[Claudia] Nine years... of casting the runes.
Nine long years of waiting for you to come...
and now you move inside of me.
You grow stronger with every beat of my heart.
translation.ko: 내 심장이 뛸 때마다 넌 더 강해지고

translation.en: And I seem to grow more beautiful with each beat of yours.
translation.ko: 네 심장이 뛸 때마다 난 더 아름다워져

translation.en: -[Lilli chuckles] -It was round, like a ball, and on it was a picture of all the lands in the world.
translation.ko: 공처럼 둥글고 그 위에 세상 온 땅의 그림이 있지

translation.en: Tell me about Paris. Tell me how the ladies spend their days.
translation.ko: 파리 얘기를 해줘 그곳 여자들은 어떻게 살아?

translation.en: -How was your trip? -Much too long, I'm afraid.
translation.ko: - 레이디 호프먼 - 구텐베르크 선생, 여행은? - 너무나도 길었답니다 - 그런 티는 안 나는군

translation.en: It doesn't show on you at all.
translation.ko: - 너무나도 길었답니다 - 그런 티는 안 나는군

translation.en: -You're looking radiant, as always. -Oh, thank you.
Lilli, shouldn't you be getting ready for tonight?
translation.ko: 릴리, 넌 오늘 밤을 준비해야 하지 않니?

translation.en: I wanted to speak with Peter for a moment.
But your dress is not appropriate for such a conversation.
translation.ko: 하지만 그런 대화에 맞는 복장이 아닌걸

translation.en: Lilli, I have a dress for you to try on... for tonight.
translation.ko: 릴리, 오늘 밤에 입으라고 드레스를 가져왔단다

translation.en: Well, I think if you're going to wear it tonight, you should try it on now.
Ilsa, will you help Lilli into it?
-And cover your hair-- -I don't know if I'm going to wear it.
It's just like all my other dresses.
I want to wear something special for tonight.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤에는 특별한 걸 입고 싶어요

translation.en: But this is special. I wore it myself when I was a girl.
translation.ko: 이것도 특별해 내가 어릴 때 입던 옷이지

translation.en: Lilli, why must we... struggle so?
-Frederick? -Hmm? You have said nothing about my gown tonight.
translation.ko: 프레더릭, 오늘 밤엔 내 옷에 대해 말이 없네

translation.en: [man] A blessing on your child, Lady Hoffman.
You look lovely, as always. [woman] To a healthy son, My Lord.
-Where's Lilli? -It's her habit to be late.
translation.ko: 릴리는 어디 있어? - 항상 지각이잖아 - 축복을 빕니다

translation.en: How could she be late tonight, of all nights?
Must we spend all of our time worrying about Lilli?
translation.ko: 릴리 걱정이나 하며 시간을 보낼 거야?

translation.en: [woman 2] To a healthy child, My Lady.
Lilli, why are you wearing your mother's gown?
translation.ko: 릴리, 왜 네 엄마 옷을 입고 있지?

translation.en: I wanted you to be proud of me.
Your silence is no comfort to me, Peter.
And what of my wife? She is in no danger...
but she will never bear another child.
translation.ko: 하지만 더는 아이를 가지실 수 없습니다

translation.en: Don't let them throw him away.
Why is this happening to me?
translation.ko: 왜 내게 이런 일이 생기는 거지?

translation.en: Why is this happening to me?
translation.ko: 왜 내게 이런 일이 생기는 거야?

translation.en: Is it? I will always tell you the truth.
Yes. There is so much to envy.
I know we've never gotten along.
translation.ko: 우리가 잘 지내지 못한 거 알아요

translation.en: I know I pushed you away.
I must have blamed you for so many things...
but I never meant to hurt you.
You're such a lovely girl, Lilli.
I don't think I ever realized...
[Peter] I have very much enjoyed our time together these past few weeks.
translation.ko: 지난 몇 주간 너와 함께라서 즐거웠어

translation.en: I must be leaving for Paris in a few days.
translation.ko: 난 며칠 후엔 파리로 떠나야 해

translation.en: I intend to ask your father for your hand in marriage.
translation.ko: 네 아버지께 결혼 허락을 받으려고 해
구텐베르크 선생님, 죄송하지만 레이디 호프먼께서 부르십니다

translation.en: but Lady Hoffman requests your presence at once.
translation.ko: 구텐베르크 선생님, 죄송하지만 레이디 호프먼께서 부르십니다 당장요

translation.en: Will you ride in with me?
I'll meet you at the stables.
What's wrong? Are you all right?
How did she look in that final moment?
Did she beg for her life?
Did she know it was me?
Oh, brother, you mustn't feel remorse.
The blood you spilled was just the venom of a scheming child.
translation.ko: 네가 흘리게 한 피는 교활한 아이의 독액이었을 뿐이야

translation.en: Why don't you take what's left to the kitchen...
put it in the stew by the fire.
What the devil is keeping them?
I'm sure she'll be arriving any moment.
-[Frederick] What is it, Peter? -I've just come from the stables.
Your groomsman found Lilli's horse on the road.
If you want to live, don't make a sound.
Mind the stairs. Lay him on the table.
translation.ko: 조심, 문에서 비켜, 계단 주의해! 탁자 위에 내려드려라

translation.en: I've been praying since you left that you would find her.
We have to keep looking. We have to.
Of course. We will, my beloved.
What's your name, child? She is no child.
Then she won't make a fuss when the wolves eat her.
I bet she tastes good too.
So, we got us a little princess here.
Do you want to see what Lord Hoffman and his judges do to people who steal?
translation.ko: 호프먼 나리와 재판관이 도둑에게 내리는 벌을 보여줘?

translation.en: [woman's voice] Why did you betray me, traitor?
Why are you treating me this way? I've done nothing wrong to any of you.
translation.ko: 나한테 왜 그래? 내가 잘못한 것도 없잖아

translation.en: A kiss. A bow and a kiss.
Here, Princess, kiss this here pair of mugs.
You boys don't see it, do you?
We could get rich off this little morsel.
translation.ko: 이 꼬마를 이용하면 부자가 될 수 있어

translation.en: Your brain's gone soggy with that rotgut you're always swilling.
translation.ko: 맨날 싸구려 술만 퍼마시더니 뇌가 눅눅해졌구나!

translation.en: We scratch around here like rats in the ground, and what does it ever get us?
Closer to the mother lode, boy.
No one's asking you to stay, are they?
I bet your daddy wishes his little girl was back home again.
translation.ko: 네 아빠는 어린 딸이 돌아오길 빌고 있겠지

translation.en: ...offer just about all his gold to have his little princess back home again...
translation.ko: 제 딸을 찾으려고 어떤 금은보화라도 바칠걸

translation.en: -without so much as a scratch on her. -[grunts]
Though I'm sure he wouldn't mind too much
if we took just a little something for ourselves...
translation.ko: 우리끼리 좀 즐기더라도 네 아빠는 괜찮을 거야

translation.en: before we give you back. I mean, he's a big man, right?
translation.ko: 너를 돌려주기 전에 이 정도는 너그럽게 봐주겠지?

translation.en: Maybe you ought to soak yourself in the river.
I'm just trying to keep things lively.
[man 1] Why don't you just leave? [man 4] Go on.

translation.ko: 너흰 그 밑에서 다 죽을 거다

translation.en: All of you is gonna die.
The world is a dangerous place, Princess.
What about her? What about her?
What if she flees? Runs away?
She'll never find her way out of here.
[man 1] The little princess is following us.
-[man 1] Hey, Lars. -[caws] Maybe she'll help us find the gold.
translation.ko: 라스, 공주 덕에 금을 찾을지도 모르지

translation.en: You're not afraid, are you, my child?
My sweetest son, I will keep you safe...
And she will never hurt you again.
translation.ko: 다신 그 아이가 널 해칠 수 없어

translation.en: When she's buried in the ground.
Did you think you could hide from me?
Did you think I wouldn't be able to find you?
Is your little heart beginning to pound?
[man 4] Lilli! Get the rope! Grab the rope!
Come on, Gilbert! Take hold of my hand!
translation.ko: 어서, 길버트! 내 손 꽉 잡아!

translation.en: Would take some of this lovely soup to my husband?
Maybe we should have ransomed her.
She's brought nothing but black luck since she came here.
translation.ko: 저 녀석이 온 후로 재수가 안 좋잖아

translation.en: It's just the two of us now, Frederick.
the earth has swallowed her up.
Never look a raven in the eye for too long.
translation.ko: 까마귀랑 너무 오랫동안 눈 마주치지 마

translation.en: Might steal your soul and fly away with it.
Why are you staring at me?
It hadn't occurred to me to look anywhere else.
It's very rude. It's one of my better habits.
I take it you have no manners then.
I was just wondering what it would take...
I'm the daughter of Frederick Hoffman.
Ah. So you're nothing more than a name?
What right do you have to say that? You know nothing about me.
translation.ko: 왜 그런 말을 해? 날 알지도 못하면서

translation.en: I know enough of your kind.
How could you know anything about anyone?
You live like an animal. You hide out like a criminal.
And what are you doing, Princess?
-Is this some holiday you're taking? -My father will find me.
translation.ko: 그러는 공주는? 휴가라도 나오셨나? - 아버지께서... - 그 아버지가 어디 있는데?

translation.en: Where is this great father of yours? How come he hasn't rescued you?
translation.ko: - 아버지께서... - 그 아버지가 어디 있는데? - 구하러 오지도 않았잖아? - 분명 오실 거야!

translation.en: He'll find me, I know it!
translation.ko: - 구하러 오지도 않았잖아? - 분명 오실 거야!

translation.en: -I don't like the way you speak to me. -How would you have me speak?
translation.ko: - 네 말투 마음에 안 들어 - 어떻게 말해줄까?

translation.en: Like a civilized gentleman, not some savage.
That is a word I will not bear from the lips of any man or woman.
translation.ko: 그딴 발언은 어떤 인간이든 용서 안 해

translation.en: The last time I heard that word spoken...
translation.ko: 나한테 마지막으로 그 소리를 한 자는...

translation.en: it was by one of your so-called gentlemen...
and there was nothing gentle about it...
or civilized. Let go of me.
Oh, Lady Hoffman. Excuse me, I... I was expecting one of your servants.
translation.ko: 레이디 호프먼, 죄송합니다 시종을 기다리고 있었어요

translation.en: They became very ill... quite suddenly.

translation.ko: 어떻게 된 거죠? 보기 힘들 정도로 끔찍했지

translation.en: Their hands and their feet were... filled with blood, and their faces--
I didn't want to send them away. They were like our family.
You were compelled to do so.

translation.ko: 릴리도 못 찾았는데 이런 일까지... - 그럼요 - 프레더릭도...

translation.en: I'm trying to be strong, but...
I have no one to turn to... for solace and understanding.
translation.ko: 내겐 위안도 이해도 해줄 사람이 없어

translation.en: What a fine young man you are.
What a wonderful husband you're going to make Lilli.
-Will you find her for me? -Yes, of course.
I can rely on you then?
I'll tell Frederick you called. He's much better.
translation.ko: 선생이 들렀다고 프레더릭에게 전하지 많이 나았으니

translation.en: They tied him to a stake, then burned his family while he watched.
translation.ko: 녀석은 말뚝에 묶여서 가족이 불타는 걸 지켜봤어

translation.en: Then they placed a red-hot cross of iron on his face...
because he would not repent. What was his crime?
He would not fight for their cause.
translation.ko: 그들의 명분을 위한 전쟁에서 싸우지 않았지

translation.en: -[Will] Lilli, no! -[Lilli] We can't leave him! [Will] No!
translation.ko: - 릴리, 안 돼! - 두고 갈 순 없어!

translation.en: -[Will] Let go! There's no time! -[screaming] No!
While your child lies cold and still?
Take back the child, and give him life.
Bathe the child in the father's blood.
Hello, Frederick. Did you miss me?
Look at your arm. What happened to you?
Where are the servants? I looked--
I want to free you of your misery for a little while.
I want to give you a moment of peace...
What are you doing to me?
It's what any wife would gladly do for her husband.
I have seen our child, Frederick.
I want you to give him life.

translation.ko: 그 애가 가져본 적 없던 생명

translation.en: The life he was meant to have.
You must become like the serpent.
The serpent's fruit is what you need.
Forgive me for startling you, my dear.
You look troubled. Are you lost?
I was. But now I'm going home.
Make sure you're out of the forest by nightfall.
translation.ko: 반드시 해가 지기 전에 숲을 빠져나가

translation.en: Do you want an apple? I have another one.
I have no way to pay you for one.
Two ladies on the road together.
Well, don't just look at it, deary.
I'll share it with a friend.
Life is sweet when you're young, eh?
So, tell me, what's he like?
And he's kind and gentle and...
And you love him, don't you?
You can tell me, your old granny. [chuckles]
What's the matter, dear? Cat got your tongue?
translation.ko: 무슨 일일까, 아가씨? 말이 안 나와?

translation.en: You can see, and you can hear,
but from inside the tomb of your mind.
No breath will escape your lips, no tears your eyes.
translation.ko: 숨을 쉴 순 없을 거다 눈물도 흐르지 않지

translation.en: To the world, you are dead.
And soon, even your precious father will forget you were ever alive.
translation.ko: 사랑하는 네 아버지도 곧 널 잊을 거야

translation.en: You will have all eternity to remember.
[man] What are you doing? [Peter] I'm a doctor.
-We're going to be married. -Can you help her?
-Can you help her, please? -I said, I don't know yet!
I said her limbs are stiffening. There's nothing more I can do.
translation.ko: 사지가 굳는다는 뜻이다 어찌할 도리가 없어

translation.en: I'm going home. I'm going to take her back to her family for a proper burial.
translation.ko: 난 돌아가겠다 가족에게 데려가 제대로 된 장례를 치러야지

translation.en: I demand you stop this at once.
[panting] I brought someone... to keep you company.
She knew I would come back.
I'm going to go find her.
I'm going to find my father.
Go away. My daughter is dead.
Take my father out of here.
for a little wench who's been rotting in the ground.
the moment you took your first breath.
It was like a knife in my heart.
I've seen what you've done to my father.
He is alive in this room.
Oh, dear, don't point that thing at me.
What have you done to me?
What have you done to me?
What have you done to me?
